attributes.review: Horrible app. Constantly glitching and crashing just like this administration. My toes have gone missing, my hair is turning into snakes. That may be a feature of the app though, considering the president is a sister snake. Hiss hiss hehe. Sometimes🤩I🥰Don’t👄Wanna😤Be🐸Happy🤷🏻‍♀️Don’t💙Hold😌It🚗Against🎉Me✨
attributes.title: Very Unstable

attributes.review: Took 63 hours and 14 minutes to download. app is very buggy and crashed my phone 3 times before completely shutting down my phone. I had to get a brand new phone
attributes.title: Terrible app in every aspect

attributes.review: i am a very veryyyyyy loyal trump supporter and everything was working perfectly fine when i was figuring out how to raise money for a wall that still hasn’t been built to keep all the pedophiles in the america and keep mexico safe from us, i mean srsly they rly need to hurry it up, and thennnn i opened tik tok and it started glitching so so so hard and i figured out it was from trumps app and don’t tell him this but i like tik tok better than him ☺️
